title: Freeman Lectures - Robert Menard pack
description:
4 lecture pack. Differences between statutes and laws and how as being a free person you have more rights than you ever dreamed of as long as you exercise them. A lot of words you thought you understood actually have a different legal definition. Such as a person is a legal entity created when you are born. Everyone are human beings but not everyone has to be a person. Explains in simple terms how legal system really works. The Legal Definition of a Person. The Bills of Exchange Act. The Law & Equity Act. The Motor Vehicle Act. The Income Tax Act. How to use a Notary Public to secure justice. The difference between an Act and The Law. How your SIN makes you a government employee. How to create and use a Notice of Understanding and Intent and Claim of Right. How Government Entities have hoodwinked Citizens into losing their rights. Student Loans. Using a Claim of Right as a lawful excuse. Uniform Commercial Code. Freedom and responsibility.

Robert Menard - Bursting Bubbles of Government Deception [2005,dvdrip,avc,aac]{kwikpix}.mp4
Robert Menard - Magnificent Deception [2006,dvdrip,avc,aac]{kwikpix}.mp4
Robert Menard - Security of the Person.AVI
